attributes.gcd: Refers to the date as on which the snapshot of source data extracted for processing.

Refers to the source system from where data is extracted. Data can be sourced from multiple sources, this column will Refers to the source code from where the data is extracted for this extraction date.

Flag indicates whether the given dimension value record has been disabled or expired. The list of values includes Y- Indicates that the dimension value has been disabled, N- Indicates that the dimension value is not disabled and is still active.
Refers to the code applicable to the Rating Source along with Horizon separated by a space. E.g. FIT L, FIT S.
Refers to the record creation date. It has been added to all catalog entities to enable partitioning and archival.
Refers to the description that describes the features and methodology of transition matrix model.

Indicates if the transition frequency represent frequency at which the transition matrix is re calculated. The possible List of Values are M for Monthly, Q for Quarterly, H for Half Yearly, Y for Yearly.
Refers to the Transition Matrix Identifier represents a Transition matrix model. It is used to associate with matrix data.
Refers to the Transition Matrix model Name is expected to be self explanatory to represent unique features of the matrix.
Refers to the equivalent numeric identifier of the Transition Matrix Numeric Identifier.

Flag indicates if the same transition matrix for more than one period it means said Transition Matrix is time homogeneous for that period. When different matrix are used, it means they are time non homogeneous. List of values are Y, N. For example, Transition Frequency is three Months and Time Homogeneous indicator Y indicates the quarterly matrix to continue for subsequent quarters up to Applicable period. If the indicator is N then applicable period should always be one and vice versa.
Refers to the value in this column indicates basis of transition matrix whether it is Rating based or DPD based.

governance.dqDesc: Should have list of values as N,Y
governance.dqType: List of Values or Code Check

governance.dqDesc: Should have list of values as H,M,Q,Y
governance.dqType: List of Values or Code Check

governance.dqDesc: Should have list of values as N,Y
governance.dqType: List of Values or Code Check
